service: lambda-orchestrator

frameworkVersion: '4'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs22.x
  region: us-east-1
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  environment:
    CUSTOMERS_API_BASE: ${env:CUSTOMERS_API_BASE, 'http://localhost:3001'}
    ORDERS_API_BASE: ${env:ORDERS_API_BASE, 'http://localhost:3002'}
    SERVICE_TOKEN: ${env:SERVICE_TOKEN, ''}
    ORCHESTRATOR_TOKEN: ${env:ORCHESTRATOR_TOKEN, ''}

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

functions:
  orchestrate:
    handler: src/handler.createAndConfirm
    events:
      - httpApi:
          method: POST
          path: /orchestrator/create-and-confirm-order
